decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.
Condition : 2 - All new internal and external works, including works of making good, shall match the original work in both type, colour and dimensions of materials and in detailed execution.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1426/Ex/001, 1426/Ex/002, 1426/Ex/003, 1426/Ex/004, 1426/Ex/005, 1426/Ex/006, 1426/Ex/007, 1426/Ex/008, 1426/Ex/009, 1426/P/147, Design and Access Statement March 2015, Heritage Assessment March 2015. Received: 08/04/2015. 1426/P/120, 1426/P/121 Rev. A, 1426/P/122 Rev. A, 1426/P/123 Rev. A, 1426/P/164 Rev. A, 1426/P/165, 1426/P/166, 1426/P/167, 1426/D/500. Received: 28/05/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
description: Listed building consent for conversion of loft space into habitable space to create an additional two flats. Conversion includes six new lead clad dormers to rear roof slope, two front roof windows, four new doors at the ground floor with staircases to access the rear garden and internal alterations to the layout
